update user_recommendation set
amount =amount+#{amount},
coin =coin+#{coin},
update_time=now() where user_id=#{userId}
and coin+#{coin} > 0
and amount+#{amount} > 0
update user_recommendation set amount = 0, update_time=now() where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id,account from `user` where delete_status=0 AND forbidden_enable=0 AND user_type !='TRIAL' and id NOT in( SELECT user_id from user_recommendation )

SELECT insert(a.user_account, 4, 5, '*****') AS userAccount, ( CASE WHEN b.portrait IS NULL THEN '' ELSE b.portrait END ) AS portrait, a.num AS num FROM user_recommendation a LEFT JOIN `user` b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE b.agent_enable != 0 AND a.num > 0 AND a.delete_status = 0 AND b.delete_status = 0 AND b.forbidden_enable = 0 AND b.nobet_enable = 0 AND b.frozen_enable = 0 ORDER BY a.num DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT a.user_id as userId, a.user_account as userAccount, a.num as num, a.recommendation_code as recommendationCode, a.agent_hierarchy_id as agentHierarchyId, b.`name` as agentHierarchyName FROM user_recommendation a LEFT JOIN user_agent_hierarchy b ON a.agent_hierarchy_id = b.id WHERE a.delete_status != 1 AND b.delete_status != 1 and a.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT a.id as userId, a.account as userAccount, a.commission as commission, IFNULL(b.recommendation_code,'') as recommendationCode, IFNULL(b.num,0) as subordinateNum, IFNULL(COUNT(c.id),0) as num FROM user a LEFT JOIN user_recommendation b ON a.id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN user_recommendation_tree c ON a.id=c.parant_user_id WHERE a.delete_status != 1 AND b.delete_status != 1 AND a.id=#{userId} GROUP BY a.id
